newsitem.title: GERMANY: Germany wants prison for mobile phone users in air.
newsitem.headline: Germany wants prison for mobile phone users in air.

text.p: German Transport Minister Matthias Wissmann wants the use of private mobile telephones in aircraft to be punishable with a fine or a two year jail term, a newspaper reported on Saturday.

"In order to further increase air transport safety there will be new regulations in the use of these dangerous things," the Bild am Sonntag quoted Wissmann as saying in a release ahead of publication on Sunday.
"In future the use of electronic equipment by passengers in aircraft will be banned," Wissmann said.
Airlines already discourage the use of mobile phones on boardplanes because they could interfere with flight communications and electronic equipment.
